Delta Lake Pyspark Helper Class

class src.DeltaLakeHelper.DeltaLakeHelper(delta_lake_path: str)[source]

Bases: object

Delta Lakes Python helper class that aids in basic operations such as inserting, updating, deleting, merging, removing older files and versions, and generating Athena manifest files.

append_records_delta_lake(spark_df, max_record_per_file='10000')[source]

Append data into Delta lakes

Parameters

  • spark_df – Pyspark Dataframe

  • max_record_per_file – str ie max_record_per_file= “10000”

Returns

Bool

update_records_delta_lake(condition='', value_to_set={})[source]

Set the value on delta lake

:param condition : Str Example: condition=”emp_id = ‘3’” :param value_to_set: Dict IE value_to_set={“employee_name”: “‘THIS WAS UPDATE ON DELTA LAKE’”} :return: Bool

upsert_records_delta_lake(old_data_key, new_data_key, new_spark_df)[source]

Find one and update into delta lake If records is found it will update if not it will insert into delta lakes See Examples on How to use this

Parameters

  • old_data_key – Key is nothing but Column on which you want to merge or upsert data into delta lake

  • new_data_key – Key is nothing but Column on which you want to merge or upsert data into delta lake

  • new_spark_df – Spark DataFrame

Returns

Bool
